column4: When I insert an audio CD in Maverick, VLC media player 1.06 will start and play the first song. The status line shows "Track 1.wav". Why does '~$ mount' no device /dev/sr0?
When I insert an audio CD in Maverick, VLC media player 1.06 will start and play the first song. The status line shows "Track 1.wav". Why does '~$ mount' show no device /dev/sr0?
because you don't mount an audio CD there are no files, it's read directly from the device (CD)
rww: Thank you very much for your help.
